If you do, Pygmy Hippo assigns no combat damage this turn and at the beginning of your next main phase this turn, you add an amount of {C} to your mana pool equal to the amount of mana emptied from that player's mana pool this way.
title: Pygmy Hippo

flavor:
How can you claim the gods are merciless when they robbed the snake of its limbs to give the other creatures a sporting chance?"
—Hakim, Loreweaver
name: Python
title: Python
